name: mm-filter
description: Filters designer for any json data.

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: Data on which you need to apply the search queries.

attributes.name: searchMode
attributes.description: Instructs the mm-filter open in advance mode or simple mode. Advance mode gives more flexibility to design the query.

attributes.name: autoSearch
attributes.description: If autosearch is true, search event is fired each time, searchconfig is changed.

attributes.name: minLength
attributes.description: This works only in simple mode. Search event won't be fired until the searchValue's length is atleast minLength.

attributes.name: debounceDelay
attributes.description: This works only in simple mode. Waits for minimum milli-seconds of debounceDelay before it re-emit the search event.
